# iosxr_hw_module_profile (Resource)

This resource can manage the HW Module Profile configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_hw_module_profile" "example" {
  profile_load_balance_algorithm_hash_polynomial_index = 5
  profile_qos_max_classmap_size                        = "8"
  profile_qos_max_classmap_size_locations = [
    {
      location_name     = "0/0/CPU0"
      max_classmap_size = "8"
    }
  ]
  profile_qos_qosg_dscp_mark_enable_first       = 0
  profile_qos_qosg_dscp_mark_enable_second      = 63
  profile_qos_free_buffer_int_threshold_set     = 50
  profile_qos_free_buffer_int_threshold_clear   = 75
  profile_qos_hqos_enable                       = true
  profile_qos_stats_collection                  = true
  profile_qos_ecn_marking_stats                 = true
  profile_qos_shared_policer_per_class_stats    = true
  profile_qos_wred_stats_enable                 = true
  profile_qos_lag_scheduler                     = true
  profile_qos_conform_aware_policer             = true
  profile_qos_arp_isis_priority_enable          = true
  profile_qos_gre_exp_classification_enable     = true
  profile_qos_egress_compensation_setting_force = true
  profile_qos_policer_scale                     = "64000"
  profile_qos_nif_hp_fifo_reserve_percent       = 10
  profile_qos_nif_hp_fifo_reserve_locations = [
    {
      location_name = "0/0/CPU0"
      percent       = 10
    }
  ]
  netflow_ipfix315_enable_locations = [
    {
      location_name  = "0/0/CPU0"
      location_name2 = "0/0/CPU0"
    }
  ]
  netflow_sflow_enable_locations = [
    {
      location_name  = "0/0/CPU0"
      location_name2 = "0/0/CPU0"
    }
  ]
  stats_tx_scale_enhanced_ingress_sr                          = true
  srv6_mode_micro_segment_format_f3216                        = true
  srv6_encapsulation_l3_traffic_class_with_hoplimit_propagate = true
  sr_policy_v6_null_label_autopush                            = true
  oam_four8byte_cfm_maid_enable                               = true
  fib_bgp_pic_multipath_core_enable                           = true
  bgp_mp_pic_auto_protect_enable                              = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `bgp_mp_pic_auto_protect_enable` (Boolean) Enable pic core in forwarding chain
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `fib_bgp_pic_multipath_core_enable` (Boolean) Enable pic core in forwarding chain
- `netflow_ipfix315_enable` (Boolean) IPFIX 315 enable
- `netflow_ipfix315_enable_locations` (Attributes List) Location of NETFLOW config (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--netflow_ipfix315_enable_locations))
- `netflow_sflow_enable` (Boolean) SFLOW enable
- `netflow_sflow_enable_locations` (Attributes List) Location of NETFLOW config (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--netflow_sflow_enable_locations))
- `npu_native_mode_enable` (Boolean) Enable NPUs to operate in native mode
- `oam_four8byte_cfm_maid_enable` (Boolean) Enable 48byte cfm maid feature
- `oam_sat_enable` (Boolean) enable SAT feature
- `offload_four` (Boolean) BFDv6 and PM-HW-Offload
- `offload_one` (Boolean) BFDv6 and Bsync
- `offload_three` (Boolean) Route download and Bsync
- `offload_two` (Boolean) BFDv6 and Route download
- `profile_bundle_hash_ignore_ingress_port` (Boolean) Disable ingress port during bundle hash computation
- `profile_bundle_hash_index_locations` (Attributes List) Location of bundle-hash polynomial config (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--profile_bundle_hash_index_locations))
- `profile_bundle_hash_per_packet_round_robin` (Boolean) Enable per-packet round robin loadbalancing for all bundles in system
- `profile_load_balance_algorithm_fat_based_hash` (Boolean) FAT label based hash in l2vpn session on decap node. Reload is required for this option
- `profile_load_balance_algorithm_gtp` (Boolean) GTP optimized.
- `profile_load_balance_algorithm_gtp_mpls` (Boolean) GTP over MPLS optimized hash.
- `profile_load_balance_algorithm_hash_polynomial_index` (Number) hash polynomial index
  - Range: `1`-`6`
- `profile_load_balance_algorithm_inner_l2_field` (Boolean) inner-l2-field.
- `profile_load_balance_algorithm_ip_tunnel` (Boolean) IP tunnel optimized.
- `profile_load_balance_algorithm_l3_only` (Boolean) L3 Header only Hash.
- `profile_load_balance_algorithm_layer2` (Boolean) Layer 2 optimized.
- `profile_load_balance_algorithm_mpls_lsr_ler` (Boolean) mpls-lsr-ler.
- `profile_load_balance_algorithm_mpls_lsr_ler_optimized` (Boolean) mpls-lsr-ler-optimized.
- `profile_load_balance_algorithm_mpls_safe_speculative_parsing` (Boolean) MPLS safe Speculative parsing.
- `profile_load_balance_algorithm_pppoe` (Boolean) PPPoE session based optimized hash. Reload is required for this option
- `profile_load_balance_algorithm_pppoe_decap_fatbased_hashing` (Boolean) PPPoE session based optimized hash with FAT label based hash. Reload is required for this option
- `profile_qos_arp_isis_priority_enable` (Boolean) Prioritize ISIS and ARP packets
- `profile_qos_conform_aware_policer` (Boolean) Configure Conform Aware Policer mode
- `profile_qos_ecn_marking_stats` (Boolean) Enable ECN marking stats mode
- `profile_qos_egress_compensation_setting_force` (Boolean) Forcefully allows to configure non-unique egress compensation values ignoring ASIC limitation (not recommended).
- `profile_qos_free_buffer_int_threshold_clear` (Number) clear value in percent (must be more than set value)
  - Range: `0`-`100`
- `profile_qos_free_buffer_int_threshold_set` (Number) Configure free buffer interrupt threshold
  - Range: `0`-`100`
- `profile_qos_gre_exp_classification_enable` (Boolean) Enable Ingress EXP classification for MPLSoGRE
- `profile_qos_hqos_enable` (Boolean) Enable Hierarchical QoS
- `profile_qos_lag_scheduler` (Boolean) Enable QoS Lag Scheduler
- `profile_qos_max_classmap_size` (String) max class map size
  - Choices: `1`, `16`, `2`, `32`, `4`, `8`
- `profile_qos_max_classmap_size_locations` (Attributes List) Location of QoS config (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--profile_qos_max_classmap_size_locations))
- `profile_qos_nif_hp_fifo_reserve_locations` (Attributes List) Location of QoS config (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--profile_qos_nif_hp_fifo_reserve_locations))
- `profile_qos_nif_hp_fifo_reserve_percent` (Number) Reserve NIF FIFOs (percentage) for High Priority traffic.
  - Range: `0`-`100`
- `profile_qos_policer_scale` (String) Max policer scale [48000, 64000]
  - Choices: `48000`, `64000`
- `profile_qos_qosg_dscp_mark_enable_first` (Number) Enable both 'set qos-group' and 'set dscp/precedence' actions in the same ingress QoS policy
  - Range: `0`-`63`
- `profile_qos_qosg_dscp_mark_enable_second` (Number) Second DSCP/Precedence value
  - Range: `0`-`63`
- `profile_qos_shared_policer_per_class_stats` (Boolean) Enable shared policer (per class stats) mode
- `profile_qos_stats_collection` (Boolean) Enable QoS stats push model
- `profile_qos_wred_stats_enable` (Boolean) Enable Wred egress stats
- `sr_policy_v6_null_label_autopush` (Boolean) Configure IPV6 NULL label autopush for SR policy
- `srv6_encapsulation_l2_traffic_class_propagate` (Boolean) Propagate traffic-class from incoming packet/frame or use qos-group from input policy-map
- `srv6_encapsulation_l2_traffic_class_value` (Number) Traffic-class value (specified as 2 hexadecimal nibbles)
  - Range: `0`-`255`
- `srv6_encapsulation_l3_traffic_class_policy_map` (Boolean) Set traffic-class DSCP to qos-group selected by input policy-map
- `srv6_encapsulation_l3_traffic_class_propagate` (Boolean) Propagate traffic-class from incoming packet
- `srv6_encapsulation_l3_traffic_class_value` (Number) Traffic-class value (specified as 2 hexadecimal nibbles)
  - Range: `0`-`255`
- `srv6_encapsulation_l3_traffic_class_with_hoplimit_propagate` (Boolean) Propagate traffic-class and hop-limit from incoming packet
- `srv6_mode_base` (Boolean) Base SRv6 (Format-1) support only
- `srv6_mode_base_and_micro_segment_f3216` (Boolean) Base (F1) and F3216 co-existence support
- `srv6_mode_micro_segment_format_f3216` (Boolean) 32-bit block and 16-bit IDs
- `srv6_mode_micro_segment_format_f3216_path_mtu` (Boolean) Path MTU Discovery for the SRv6 profile
- `stats_acl_permit` (Boolean) Enable ACL permit stats.
- `stats_enhanced_sr_policy` (Boolean) Enable Enhanced_SR_Policy_Scale stats profile counter.
- `stats_ingress_sr` (Boolean) Enable ingress SR stats profile counter.
- `stats_ingress_sr_mspw` (Boolean) Enable ingress SR & MSPW stats profile counter.
- `stats_qos_enhanced` (Boolean) Enable enhanced QoS stats.
- `stats_tx_scale_enhanced` (Boolean) Enable enhanced TX stats scale (Non L2 stats).
- `stats_tx_scale_enhanced_acl_permit` (Boolean) Enable ACL permit stats.
- `stats_tx_scale_enhanced_ingress_sr` (Boolean) Enable ingress SR stats profile counter.
- `stats_tx_scale_enhanced_qos_enhanced` (Boolean) Enable enhanced QoS stats.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

Required:

- `location_name` (String) Location of NETFLOW config
- `location_name2` (String) Location of NETFLOW config

### Nested Schema for `netflow_sflow_enable_locations`

Required:

- `location_name` (String) Location of NETFLOW config
- `location_name2` (String) Location of NETFLOW config


<a id="nestedatt--profile_bundle_hash_index_locations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `profile_bundle_hash_index_locations`

Required:

- `index` (String) Configure hash index
  - Choices: `1`, `10`, `11`, `12`, `2`, `3`, `4`, `5`
- `location_name` (String) Location of bundle-hash polynomial config
- `location_name2` (String) Location of bundle-hash polynomial config


<a id="nestedatt--profile_qos_max_classmap_size_locations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `profile_qos_max_classmap_size_locations`

Required:

- `location_name` (String) Location of QoS config
- `max_classmap_size` (String) max class map size
  - Choices: `1`, `16`, `2`, `32`, `4`, `8`


<a id="nestedatt--profile_qos_nif_hp_fifo_reserve_locations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `profile_qos_nif_hp_fifo_reserve_locations`

Required:

- `location_name` (String) Location of QoS config
- `percent` (Number) Reserve NIF FIFOs (percentage) for High Priority traffic.
  - Range: `0`-`100`

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_hw_module_profile.example ""
```
